level.text: In order to participate in this on-the-job training program a person shall meet all of the following basic eligibility requirements:
Be a resident of the District of Columbia;
Have one (1) or more dependents; and
Be without a job for at least thirty (30) consecutive days prior to application.

Notwithstanding ยง601.1(d), persons enrolled in federally-funded employment and training programs administered by the Department may be subsequently enrolled in the On-Job Training Program for Adults with Dependents without an intervening period of unemployment; Provided, that the persons meet all other eligibility requirements of the program.
The Director may require that eligible participants agree to attend a pre-employment orientation and enrichment program before being considered for referral to an on-the-job training opportunity.
